DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter, prospective, observational study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of Avastin (bevacizumab) in first-line therapy in elderly patients with metastatic colorectal cancer. Data will be collected from eligible patients for24 months.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Avastin in First Line in Elderly Patients With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer (CASSIOPEE)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, >/= 75 years of age Metastatic colorectal cancer Initiating Avastin firstline therapy in combination with chemotherapy Previous Avastin therapy Patient participating in a clinical study evaluating a cytotoxic anticancer therapy and/or an investigational new drug
